alert.note: Alert for Cayuga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 26 at 6:31PM EDT until June 26 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CAYUGA COUNTY... At 629 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Cayuga, or near Seneca Falls, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Law enforcement. This storm has a history of producing wind damage with multiple reports of trees down. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Auburn, Sennett, Union Springs, Cayuga, Levanna, Throopsville and Fosterville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
